data.what_is:
We help eCommerce businesses grow sales through deep customer understanding and seamless multi-channel interactions. Our approach collects real-time data on transactions, preferences, and website behavior, stored and managed in our Customer Data Platform. This data powers our Omnichannel Marketing Automation and AI-driven personalization.

Our platform, co-developed with e-commerce marketers, introduces innovative tools like zero-party data collection, AI email design, and flexible workflows to address e-commerce challenges. Trusted by global brands like Adidas, Converse, and Crocs, we consistently deliver a 5-10x conversion boost and 40% annual growth, recognized by G2 for excellence. Think of us as an extension of your marketing team, always focused on delivering value, starting with a custom Growth Plan tailored to your business.
More information: www.salesmanago.com
data.product_description: SALESmanago Marketing Automation provides an easy to implement next generation solutions that redefine the way traditional marketing tools are used. They are always going above and beyond the expectations regarding the capabilities of email marketing, dynamic & personalized website content, social media marketing, online advertising, and mobile marketing.

initial_reviews.review_title: Sales Menago Review
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
Collaboration with Sales Menago has been a very positive experience from the very beginning, even before it officially started. They pay great attention to the client's goals that the system is supposed to meet. The support from the first moments is very professional. You constantly feel the support and dedication of the advisors at every step. For me, this was very valuable because I had never dealt with Marketing Automation before. The system itself is very intuitive to use and any beginner can handle it. At the same time, the system offers a lot of features and possibilities. Many ideas in the team end with the words "this can be done in Sales Menago."

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
There are a few minor solutions that could be done differently (like a button here instead of there, etc.), but these are small details that don't significantly impact the work within the system. It's impossible to satisfy everyone :)

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
t's hard for me to find a problem that I can't address in Sales Menago.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very advanced tool and money maker. Fully satisfied.

Monnari Trade S.A. is very satisfied with the successful implementation of the Sales Manago. The process was smooth and efficient, mostly thanks to the excellent cooperation with the supervisor, who was always available and helpful. The system has also had a positive impact on the sales performance, as it has enabled us to reach more potential customers and personalize our communication. initial_reviews.review_title: Complex tool with many options and excellent service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
We have been using SALESmanago for about a year. It is a very complex tool that can be expanded with many different modules. It can be a bit overwhelming at first. However, thanks to the very well-supported onboarding phase, you quickly familiarise yourself with it. Even after the onboarding phase, a contact person is available to answer any questions you may have, so you never have to deal with challenges on your own. It's a really great service that makes it easy to move forward.

The tool communicates well with our Magento 2 shop so that we can use many insights for marketing automations.
Customised solutions can also be built if there is no ready-made way to implement things.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
For complete beginners who want to start with marketing automations etc., the tool might be a little too complex. The support team will certainly be of great help here.
Sometimes you don't immediately find the areas you are looking for in the tool, which takes a little time. But the more you use the tool, the easier it is to find your way around. Training new employees to use SALESmanago is therefore a bit of a challenge, for which it is best to create a detailed guide.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
With SALESmanago we can set up much more complex marketing automations than before. You are not limited to just one channel, e.g. email marketing, but can include different channels (Google Ads/ Social Ads) and thus catch customers at different points.
Personalisation in the online shop, pop-ups and other elements can also be set up easily and work without any problems.

We also use the chatbot and live chat to offer our customers an even better service. This module can also be set up with relatively little effort and is easy to use for simple customer questions.

initial_reviews.review_title: A comprehensive system combined with excellent customer service

MKT automation, much less everyday work on manual things. Customers getting more proper information, personalized information, as well - information which is balanced in terms of frequency.

initial_reviews.review_title: The best marketing tools for multi-channel communication and automation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
I've had a really positive experience using SALESmanago for our digital marketing needs. What I like best about this platform is its comprehensive suite of tools that cater to various aspects of marketing automation and customer engagement. From email marketing with its user-friendly drag-and-drop editor to advanced lead generation techniques, the platform offers everything we need to streamline our marketing efforts.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
One aspect I find less appealing is the initial learning curve. The platform offers an extensive range of features, which can be overwhelming at first, and getting to grips with all its functionalities requires some time and effort. Fortunately, the training materials are very helpful and user-friendly and easier to understand for beginners.
Additionally they could be perhaps a little more extensive statistics in some areas.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
SALESmanago has been instrumental in solving several of our key marketing challenges. Firstly, it has significantly automated our email  marketing campaigns, saving us a considerable amount of time and resources. The lead scoring and segmentation capabilities have also allowed us to target our marketing efforts more effectively, leading to better engagement rates and higher conversion. Its integration capabilities mean that we can seamlessly connect it with other tools we use, creating a more efficient workflow.

Overall, the benefits of using SALESmanago far outweigh the initial challenges of learning the system. Its ability to automate and personalize marketing efforts has not only improved our efficiency but also enhanced our relationship with customers, ultimately contributing positively to our business growth.

initial_reviews.review_title: Avoid
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
I regret to say that our experience has been nothing short of disappointing and unprofessional!

We signed up for a 12 month contract, with the option to leave after 6 months and requested our payments be split monthly, in which they agreed and sent us a 12 monthly breakdown of the payments due. 6 months later we received a further bill of EUR11,800 in which I queried their suspected error, only for them to come back and state the contract was for 6 months and the next 6 monthly payment was now due. This charge was not communicated to us clearly and was not a part of the initial agreement in which we signed up for.

Throughout the entire sign-up process, we received multiple emails from their team clearly stating the 12-month duration of the contract.

In an effort to resolve this matter amicably, we attempted to discuss the issue with their team, providing evidence of the 12-month payment plan outlined in the emails we received. However, our concerns were not taken seriously, and our subsequent correspondences were repeatedly ignored.

Despite our clear intention not to renew the contract, we continued to receive further invoices, and despite replying to each email, we never receive a reply.

We have now been approached by their appointed debt collectors, threatening legal action if we do not pay an outstanding amount of approximately EUR24,000 however we have full evidence of our correspondence and lack of theirs so will be taking this further.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Through this scenario I would not recommend this service, not only through mis-selling their service, but for lack of customer care.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Was hoping for a platform to automate our marketing & offer a personal service but this isn't the service we hoped for

initial_reviews.review_title: SALESmanago is a powerful marketing automation platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
SALESmanago is a powerful marketing automation platform that promises to transform the way businesses engage with their customers. Having had the opportunity to use SALESmanago extensively, I can confidently say that it is a robust and feature-rich solution that offers impressive marketing capabilities.

One of the standout features of SALESmanago is its comprehensive marketing automation suite. The platform allows users to create highly personalized and automated marketing campaigns based on customer behavior and interactions. From email marketing to lead nurturing, SALESmanago streamlines the entire process, saving valuable time and effort for marketing teams.

The AI-driven recommendation engine is another noteworthy aspect of SALESmanago. It analyzes customer data, purchase history, and behavior to provide targeted product recommendations, enhancing the customer experience and increasing the likelihood of conversions.

The intuitive user interface deserves praise as well. Navigating through SALESmanago is relatively easy, even for those without prior marketing automation experience. The platform's dashboard provides a clear overview of marketing activities, campaign performance, and customer insights, empowering users to make data-driven decisions.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
It might be overwhelming for small businesses with limited marketing resources and users without prior marketing automation experience.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Understanding and knowing our customers better. It empowers businesses to enhance customer engagement, optimize marketing efforts and drive growth through personalized campaigns. We've definitely noticed an improvement in sales since we started our cooperation with SALESmanago.

all_reviews.review_title: Complex tool with many options and excellent service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
We have been using SALESmanago for about a year. It is a very complex tool that can be expanded with many different modules. It can be a bit overwhelming at first. However, thanks to the very well-supported onboarding phase, you quickly familiarise yourself with it. Even after the onboarding phase, a contact person is available to answer any questions you may have, so you never have to deal with challenges on your own. It's a really great service that makes it easy to move forward.

The tool communicates well with our Magento 2 shop so that we can use many insights for marketing automations.
Customised solutions can also be built if there is no ready-made way to implement things.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
For complete beginners who want to start with marketing automations etc., the tool might be a little too complex. The support team will certainly be of great help here.
Sometimes you don't immediately find the areas you are looking for in the tool, which takes a little time. But the more you use the tool, the easier it is to find your way around. Training new employees to use SALESmanago is therefore a bit of a challenge, for which it is best to create a detailed guide.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
With SALESmanago we can set up much more complex marketing automations than before. You are not limited to just one channel, e.g. email marketing, but can include different channels (Google Ads/ Social Ads) and thus catch customers at different points.
Personalisation in the online shop, pop-ups and other elements can also be set up easily and work without any problems.

We also use the chatbot and live chat to offer our customers an even better service. This module can also be set up with relatively little effort and is easy to use for simple customer questions.

all_reviews.review_title: A comprehensive system combined with excellent customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
1) Excellet customer service - you can contact via chat or send email to support team and they will answer very quickly, as well they will always be interested to find solution. I think this is very important point when you are ready to take a step for new system implementation like Sales Manago.
2) Various customer friendly options how to build your communication templates - email, SMS, webpush etc.. All of those are easy to understand and you can make everything simple MKT or sales person without involving IT. As well in case you are using external tool - you can just paste html code also in Sales Manago in order to create email template.
3) Possibility to see access 360 view - login, page visits, reaction on communication - all this are very useful when you think about building automated communication.
4) you can actually import data and start to use it manually (before IT finish full integration). I actually would suggest that you really do that - cause then you will better understand what you really want that IT would set up.
5) automation flows can be really rich - with many communication points with customer, even with adding social media or google into those.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
There might be a bit more of fields allowed to use in segmentation. also for details it would be usefull dropdown of fields you are having like it is for dictonary details.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
MKT automation, much less everyday work on manual things. Customers getting more proper information, personalized information, as well - information which is balanced in terms of frequency.

I've had a really positive experience using SALESmanago for our digital marketing needs. What I like best about this platform is its comprehensive suite of tools that cater to various aspects of marketing automation and customer engagement. From email marketing with its user-friendly drag-and-drop editor to advanced lead generation techniques, the platform offers everything we need to streamline our marketing efforts.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
One aspect I find less appealing is the initial learning curve. The platform offers an extensive range of features, which can be overwhelming at first, and getting to grips with all its functionalities requires some time and effort. Fortunately, the training materials are very helpful and user-friendly and easier to understand for beginners.
Additionally they could be perhaps a little more extensive statistics in some areas.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
SALESmanago has been instrumental in solving several of our key marketing challenges. Firstly, it has significantly automated our email  marketing campaigns, saving us a considerable amount of time and resources. The lead scoring and segmentation capabilities have also allowed us to target our marketing efforts more effectively, leading to better engagement rates and higher conversion. Its integration capabilities mean that we can seamlessly connect it with other tools we use, creating a more efficient workflow.

Overall, the benefits of using SALESmanago far outweigh the initial challenges of learning the system. Its ability to automate and personalize marketing efforts has not only improved our efficiency but also enhanced our relationship with customers, ultimately contributing positively to our business growth.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
I regret to say that our experience has been nothing short of disappointing and unprofessional!

We signed up for a 12 month contract, with the option to leave after 6 months and requested our payments be split monthly, in which they agreed and sent us a 12 monthly breakdown of the payments due. 6 months later we received a further bill of EUR11,800 in which I queried their suspected error, only for them to come back and state the contract was for 6 months and the next 6 monthly payment was now due. This charge was not communicated to us clearly and was not a part of the initial agreement in which we signed up for.

Throughout the entire sign-up process, we received multiple emails from their team clearly stating the 12-month duration of the contract.

In an effort to resolve this matter amicably, we attempted to discuss the issue with their team, providing evidence of the 12-month payment plan outlined in the emails we received. However, our concerns were not taken seriously, and our subsequent correspondences were repeatedly ignored.

Despite our clear intention not to renew the contract, we continued to receive further invoices, and despite replying to each email, we never receive a reply.

We have now been approached by their appointed debt collectors, threatening legal action if we do not pay an outstanding amount of approximately EUR24,000 however we have full evidence of our correspondence and lack of theirs so will be taking this further.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Through this scenario I would not recommend this service, not only through mis-selling their service, but for lack of customer care.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Was hoping for a platform to automate our marketing & offer a personal service but this isn't the service we hoped for

all_reviews.review_title: SALESmanago is a powerful marketing automation platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
SALESmanago is a powerful marketing automation platform that promises to transform the way businesses engage with their customers. Having had the opportunity to use SALESmanago extensively, I can confidently say that it is a robust and feature-rich solution that offers impressive marketing capabilities.

One of the standout features of SALESmanago is its comprehensive marketing automation suite. The platform allows users to create highly personalized and automated marketing campaigns based on customer behavior and interactions. From email marketing to lead nurturing, SALESmanago streamlines the entire process, saving valuable time and effort for marketing teams.

The AI-driven recommendation engine is another noteworthy aspect of SALESmanago. It analyzes customer data, purchase history, and behavior to provide targeted product recommendations, enhancing the customer experience and increasing the likelihood of conversions.

The intuitive user interface deserves praise as well. Navigating through SALESmanago is relatively easy, even for those without prior marketing automation experience. The platform's dashboard provides a clear overview of marketing activities, campaign performance, and customer insights, empowering users to make data-driven decisions.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
It might be overwhelming for small businesses with limited marketing resources and users without prior marketing automation experience.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Understanding and knowing our customers better. It empowers businesses to enhance customer engagement, optimize marketing efforts and drive growth through personalized campaigns. We've definitely noticed an improvement in sales since we started our cooperation with SALESmanago.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
I've been working closely with SALESmanago for just a few months, and in such a short time, I've quickly grasped the potential of this platform. The addition and involvement of our Customer Success Manager Aleksandra have fostered collaboration between our brand and your project. Working with  SALESmanago means having 360-degree support from both a technical and commercial perspective, with well-defined objectives to achieve through constantly evolving strategies and recommendations. I find the platform's usability and problem management easy, both in the short and long term, although I'm a newcomer in this.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
The only suggestion I'd like to provide is to channel technical requests and bring them to the attention of a maximum of 2 operators per client, rather than involving an entire technical support team. This approach ensures project continuity and a smoother, faster bug management.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
SALESmanago is assisting us in communicating with customers for marketing and profiling purposes, reengaging customers who haven't visited or made purchases on our website, and retaining those who have opted to be contacted for promotions and initiatives.

What do you like best about SALESmanago?
The service offers many different features and functionalities and can be integrated with other systems and services. It can significantly help create a lot of exciting and custom automation if you have a lot of customer data and other connected services.
Lately, there has been an excellent effort to use different features with dynamic content instead of them creating it custom for you, which could take up to a year.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Came upon many bugs which are quite challenging to catch until it's all already in production.
Things can get quite complex, and when looking for help from their support, it can take a lot of time to figure things out. Mainly because functionalities are not written or displayed to understand them like they actually function, reading through the documentation does not get you an exact answer either.
The connections to other services can just stop working, and you are not getting notified in any way, so there could be months until you see that something is wrong, losing time and effort in getting results.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimising budgets, automating things, communicating dynamic content to users, surveys...

What do you like best about SALESmanago?
I recently had the pleasure of starting to use salesmanago and I have to say, I'm quite impressed with the platform. The introduction to the system was well-prepared and easy to navigate, which made the onboarding process a breeze. Additionally, the support team is highly responsive and provided answers to my queries within 24 hours.

One aspect that I found particularly advantageous is the personalized onboarding process. I was assigned a dedicated account manager who scheduled regular meetings with me to understand my business needs and customize the system accordingly. This allowed me to better adapt the system to my business and ensure its effectiveness.

Furthermore, salesmanago has been instrumental in increasing my e-commerce website's conversions and improving traffic to the site. The platform's tools and features helped me optimize my marketing campaigns and reach a more targeted audience.

Overall, I'm highly satisfied with my experience using salesmanago and would highly recommend it to other businesses looking for effective solutions for marketing and customer relationship management.

After two months, I haven't noticed any negative aspects of using SalesManago.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
SALESmanago (SM) es una buena herramienta que nos ofrece muchas posibilidades: crear acciones automatizadas, enviar emails, segmentar nuestra audiencia, crear contenido a traves de landings, realizar integraciones y conversar en linea con nuestros clientes.

Nuestros colaboradores Agnieszka Grodecka y John Morales estan siempre a la orden, nos brindan su asistencia permanente sobre las diferentes funciones de la herramienta como en los proyectos que realizamos en la empresa.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
SALESmanago tiene funciones muy buenas, pero con configuraciones muy limitadas, por ejemplo, al crear marcos de recomendacion, las pocas opciones que brindan las reglas de automatizacion, los mails automaticos del formulario o de las alertas no se pueden editar y son muy engorrosos. No se pueden incluir emoticones en el cuerpo del email que no sean compatibles con el sistema, de algunas funciones no podemos obtener datos analiticos de un periodo especifico. Ademas, algunas funciones carecen de una descripcion detallada.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automatiza el trabajo manual, nos ayuda mucho en la creacion de contenido, conversar en linea con nuestros clientes y analizar su comportamiento.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about SALESmanago?
review_question_answers.answer:
SALESmanago (SM) es una buena herramienta que nos ofrece muchas posibilidades: crear acciones automatizadas, enviar emails, segmentar nuestra audiencia, crear contenido a traves de landings, realizar integraciones y conversar en linea con nuestros clientes.

Nuestros colaboradores Agnieszka Grodecka y John Morales estan siempre a la orden, nos brindan su asistencia permanente sobre las diferentes funciones de la herramienta como en los proyectos que realizamos en la empresa.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
review_question_answers.answer: SALESmanago tiene funciones muy buenas, pero con configuraciones muy limitadas, por ejemplo, al crear marcos de recomendacion, las pocas opciones que brindan las reglas de automatizacion, los mails automaticos del formulario o de las alertas no se pueden editar y son muy engorrosos. No se pueden incluir emoticones en el cuerpo del email que no sean compatibles con el sistema, de algunas funciones no podemos obtener datos analiticos de un periodo especifico. Ademas, algunas funciones carecen de una descripcion detallada.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Automatiza el trabajo manual, nos ayuda mucho en la creacion de contenido, conversar en linea con nuestros clientes y analizar su comportamiento.

all_reviews.review_title: A useful and highly adaptable automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
SalesManago is a great all-in-one tool. The system is easy to use,  feel like SalesManago solve the day-to-day communication need.  They offer plans which allow you to have a dedicated person who helps improve the database and implement new things. That is highly helpful since it is hard to keep up with all the features and functions you might benefit from implementing.

You can get all the customer data in one place,  avoiding having customer data in different silos. The implementation is easy, and I like that it is easy to do customer segmentation with tags.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
I wish the product had more integrations with other systems and easy plug-n-play functions into telecom-, chat-, and advertising platforms.  Sorting out and optimizing the Workflow can be a bit messy since the boxes and threads can be tangled with each other.

Recommendations to others considering SALESmanago:
I think the best way is to take the system into a Proof of Concept and experience the great support.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Acquiring customers is expensive in a small nische market where churn in each marketing channel is high. The sales cycle in our field is long and the purchase itself is a high envolvement purchase which renders more than one visit to the web page and often more than one phone call. Using SalesMango is a bliss when the usage lowers the cost of paid search, since it is possible to get the customer to visit the web page through an email instead of visiting the webpage through a seach engine and paid traffic. Marketing Automation is a powerful tool to use for being top of mind and at the same time educating the customer in the brand and products and therefor reducing the time to decision and purchase.

all_reviews.review_title: !SALESmanago, lo mejor! Gracias a su equipo.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
SALESmanago es la plataforma que toda empresa necesita. Funciona a la perfeccion para tener un registro claro y detallado de las actividades y movimientos de los clientes dentro del e-commerce, asi como para generar una comunicacion permanente con ellos. Para envio de mailings y para pop-ups en la pagina web, es ideal. Sus automatizaciones son fantasticas.

Ademas, su equipo de trabajo esta altamente capacitado para responder a cualquier solicitud. Un equipo multidisciplinario y un excelente manejo de diferentes idiomas, los convierte en la plataforma perfecta para empresas internacionales que estan buscando llevar su organizacion al siguiente nivel.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Podrian mejorar su interfaz para hacerla mas amigable y llamativa.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
En KipClin usamos SALESmanago para consolidar nuestra base de datos de clientes y, en especial, para implementar nuestra estrategia de email marketing.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
SalesManago is a great all-in-one tool. You can have email, sms, wpn, LP, forms, and automation in one place, and it's easy to work with and analyze your database.
It is pretty intuitive despite the extensive panel and the multitude of options to choose from. You can integrate it with a lot of other tools. Definitely recommend this platform for email marketing :)

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
It could use a more advanced and intuitive mailing editor. Cause the advanced version gives you more or less the same as the express, but with more complications. Also IT team does not solve your problems asap when you don't have a dedicated account manager, which is for an extra cost.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Database segmentation, email automation and the possibility to creat content yourself make work easier. Also, analyzing customers' behavior in this tool helps to improve communication.

all_reviews.review_title: Tool with a good status quo, but still lots of potential
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
On the "creation side", it is very sophisticated and extensive. The baseline of features offers many possibilities to segment audiences, personalize messaging and create highly complex workflows and logics. Once the interface is studied, it is intuitive and logical.
The support is sensational, reliable and very quick! Custom solutions are developed on request. That offers many additional possibilities.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Understanding all features in detail needs some time as many features lack a detailed description (or naming convention).
On the "analytics side" the tool needs to be revised as deep analysis of generated data is often not possible. For example efficiency of single emails contained in a workflow over a specific period. Also testing workflows is difficult and could be made easier.
One very important missing part is the adaptation of emails to mobile displays. You can preview it, but not modify them to make their appearance responsive.
A/B testing within workflows is not very transparent. This feature could get its own part within the menu to do better analysis and therefore make better decisions.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated communication towards our customers depending on signals they send to the platform. We have less manual work and can let the system work for us.

all_reviews.review_title: Very intuitive and useful tool to develop sales and grow your client base
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
We have been using SALESManago for over a year now.

SALESmanago is an amazing tool that gives you a lot of analytical data, helps to automate marketing and increases sales.

When we first started using it, training were provided for the users who were going to use it most. Moreover, weekly meetings were set to see if the evolution was ok. Also, a booklet was provided with the basic implementations there exist in the tool and also proposals of those that worked better according to the business and sector.

A huge advantage is that the support team answers very quickly and also with useful questions that solve your problems.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
The little downside we find is that sometimes the IT team does not solve your problems asap, we had a bot problem and it took quite a while to solve it, which was frustrating since it required a lot of IT support. Nevertheless, it ended up being solved after some weeks.

Lastly, we would like to take more advantage of the tool of social media automation since, for now, you only have Facebook included.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
SALESManago solves the automation process of emails and of getting: contacts in our database and also being able to track them and propose personalized actions: such as emails of recently viewed products, popups, and recommendation frames, amongst others.

all_reviews.review_title: It's good but could be better.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
The system is relatively easy to use, this is, of course, a subjective matter, but I don't think I've ever felt like SalesManago caused me any difficulty in day-to-day use.
Its responsiveness and personalization capabilities proved to be quite helpful.

Another plus for me is help from our account manager. Whenever I need something to be programmed in our system, support is fast and reliable.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Lack of access to contacts defined only by cookie. This would greatly impact and improve my work regarding onsite campaighns and building client base.

New tag grouping system would be nice. For now, trying to analise what tags are on contacts card has proven to be more than difficult. It's like huge mass of all kinds of tags. Unreadable frankly speaking.

New filter in email and webpush dashboards. Sometimes I would like to check OP or CTR of a specific month or week and I simply can't do that. All I can do is use predefined options, but it's simply not enough.

Recommendations to others considering SALESmanago:
If you have an MA specialist or want to hire one, SalesManago will do great in your company.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
SalesManago can help you convert and analyze what happens on your site significantly. Still, as simple as the hub itself is, you won't get anywhere unless you have an in-house specialist.

Don't get me wrong, the system itself has tons of great functionalities, but you need a specialist on your side to squeeze every last drop out of it. Conversion rate, sales, all of it rose significantly, but still, it's not just the system.

Don't let yourself be tricked in this narrative that "automation" means the system will do anything on its own.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
We have been using Salesmanago in our online store for several years. This period of cooperation allowed us to learn about both the strengths and weaknesses of this tool.
Pros:
- Clear and easy-to-use interface. I think that the facelift was unnecessary because I got used to the older version.
- A very helpful, engaged consultant/guardian - great communication
- IT support; They can prepare personalized solutions suitable for our store
- Multitasking tool - covers the majority of our needs
- The creation of forms and other materials is intuitive and requires no HTML knowledge
- Attractive pricing

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
There are still some things to fix/develop. There are some issues with the integration with Idosell, which sometimes may be frustrating and require a lot of IT support. Some functions may be ineffective if you run e-commerce with more than one language and currency. We are waiting to develop some elements like the loyalty program as the current is not sufficient.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Increased automation of marketing processes

all_reviews.review_title: The best system for marketing communication
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
I have worked on many marketing communication systems, but Salesmanago is undoubtedly the best. In my opinion, it is an intuitive, very well-designed platform that we can use for development for both B2B and B2C companies. You can implement marketing campaigns through Salesmanago. A big plus, especially for beginners, is the support offered by the staff and access to training materials. I recommend using Salesmanago :)

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
What is miss in the Salesmanago system is a more detailed analysis of the text messaging campaigns. I would love to see in one place, for example, the number of clicks on a link to a message.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used the Salesmanago system to create automatic mailings to customers. Thanks to this solution, messages reach efficiently to them. The system allows us to nurture long-term relationships with customers and increase customer retention.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
I see two significant cons in SALESmanago. The first one is the SLA tools do not work as we expect. In some cases, data were not correctly collected, and we couldn't realize our plans and scenarios effectively. The second is support; it is the area to improve.

In the case of a small budget for this kind of Digital, Marketing Activities are a perfect solution. I couldn't use such an advanced tool for such a small budget.

all_reviews.review_title: Worst experience from my 6years in CRM field
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
Honestly, it was a nightmare to work with such a tool. We couldn't rely on anything, the platform had a lot of bugs. And the UX is super old now.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
 They called themselves automation specialists but could not send our welcome email on time (20min delay).
 Each time we had an issue we were adding to a ticket queue were every two weeks, they would scale up to another team.
 They were answering our emails sometimes at 11 PM... but unfortunately couldn't help so much. I think our account manager was overwhelmed; we could see a lot of stress. Not recommended at all to work with or work within.

 When we tried to agree with them not respecting the basics we had agreed on the contract, they stopped answering. No news from them for 4months, and no information from our money ;)

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Still on a procedure to get our money back, unfortunately.

all_reviews.review_title: Con errores internos y sin cumplir con las expectativas que prometieron
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
Nada. Al principio nos presentaron la plataforma como muy completa y llena de herramientas utiles para marketing, pero nada de ello llego a ser verdad.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Las automatizaciones de e-mail marketing no funcionan correctamente, sino que tardan mucho en activarse. Tambien la propia plataforma presenta errores internos y tiene pendiente actualizarse desde hace mucho tiempo. Se solapan las cookies con otras herramientas externas lo cual impide medir correctamente, y el equipo de soporte te da unos plazos de entrega larguisimos sin que finalmente puedan solucionar el problema.

En fin, un desastre como herramienta que nos ha hecho perder mucho tiempo y dinero.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Despues de 6 meses realizando la integracion con Sales Manago, no hemos podido solucionar los problemas presentados. Hemos pedido rescindir contrato y no se dignan ni a responder. Un desastre. Nada recomendable.

- Expert technical support to implement contact strategies easily and efficiently, anything is possible, it's just a question of how best to.
- I particularly like the ease in which we can deepen personalisation from multiple sources and reach high levels of sophistication with customer journeys, the two strategies that have the greatest impact on revenue generation.
- Affordable prices, with no worry of un-budgeted message or events overage to worry about, taking the financial burden of marketing automation away from marketers.

Email address is the primary key for persisting a customer profile. This is ok for most use cases as this key can be mapped to others on the client side. all_reviews.review_title: I don't know what I'd do without it
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
The best thing about SALESmanago is the ratio between quality and price: it gives an excellent performance at an affordable price. The are other CDPs which perform better in some aspects, but for the price they have it's often not worth it.
I also love that SALESmanago always keeps me informed on where I'm performing well and where I'm not, and my dedicated project manager is always available and useful in helping me solve any type of problems I may be facing on the platform.
Finally, it goes without saying that I've seen a substantial increase in all KPIs.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Something I dislike about CDPs in general is that the automations you can create are at a very high level type of programming, which limits the potential algorithms you can create for your funneling and marketing campaigns.
I would love it if SALESmanago could create a panel for writing a lower level code, so I can create the best strategies I can.

Recommendations to others considering SALESmanago:
Try it, it is almost guaranteed to make you increase revenue. There are even some trials you can have, the free month and the PoC; they know once you try it you'll want to keep it.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
My work processes are much more orderly, I can instantly see my progress thanks to the various dashboards and analytic panels and I am simply making more revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: Good tool for everyday use in marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
- flexibility - it's possible to adjust the tool to one's needs (maybe not totally, but to a satisfactory extent)
- it's intuitive and quite easy to use (once you've learned its structure)
- very helpful and professional support (quick response to every email, hardly any problem left without a solution - and if so, it was only because they didn't plan to implement a solution needed by us :-)
- possibility of proposing solutions they take into consideration and implement whenever it's possible and useful for other users

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
- analytics - right now I consider it to be the weakest element (it's time taking and demanding a lot of calculations in an Excel file if I want to see simple statistics regarding mails sent by rules and workflows) - definitely there's still a lot to improve in this area!
- sometimes it can be slow, especially when using a lot of functionalities at the same time

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
For us SM serves as a separate sales channel, next to telemarketing, social media, traditional email marketing, AdWords etc.. We implemented it to increase sales and as a solutions to decreasing sales in traditional email marketing, being a result of GDPR implementation. I can say we've been very successful and keep on going to be even more - in the beginning of 2020 we hit our first milion PLN of turnover, generated by SALESmanago ;-)

all_reviews.review_title: The perfect choice for B2C marketing automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
When B2C-focused companies look for marketing automation tools, they want to be able to handle a massive amount of contacts without the need to go too deep in an individual contact card in the CRM. SALESmanago collects both transactional and behavioral data in a structured manner so setting up not only basic but also more complex automation workflows is a piece of cake. Learning to use the system does not take long, you really can focus on building a winning growth strategy over getting too deep in technical questions. Also, there are new features coming almost every month, so the only limit is time.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Cannot say too much negative about the tool, it is a software that develops all the time. A while ago I would have said reporting could improve, but they have recently released several reporting dashboards.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Primarily:
- lead generation
- database management
- conversion optimisation
- customer journey mapping

Benefits:
- increased effectiveness in inbound marketing
- increased sales
- shorter time to first purchase
- lower churn
- higher loyalty

7. Last but not least, GDPR related issues

all_reviews.review_title: Best automation solution for companies who want cross channel results
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
I like the variety of tools and features that SalesManago offers me, not just for website but for other digital channels like social media and advertising. Also, their customer support is spectacular. I was always one of people who didn't care about customer support too much as long as the product is good, but I was wrong. With so many various tools and possibilities SalesManago offers me, I find myself almost everyday wanting an advice how to make something better, and SalesManago customer support always steps in. Sometimes I feel like I have one more person next to me in the office, and that is a nice feeling of security to have.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
One of best things about SalesManago is also one of the "worst things". They constantly add new features so it sometimes can be a bit overwhelming for a single user as me to learn and handle. But, like I stated before, their customer support always answers on time and helps. If I have to be a bit picky, their wizard for creating newsletters could have few more features and templates for more complex email designs, but if you are used to create complex email designs, you should already be used to code them manually on your own.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Lead nurturing
- CRM lead integration
- Personalization of content for every single known customer on our website

We now use SalesManago instead of practically every other system we used in past that helped us with digital marketing and automation of sales process.

all_reviews.review_title: Best features, worst platform and support.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
All the features are great. They offer you the best marketing software.... If it worked....

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Where do i start.... Their software just does not work. What ever they did, no matter how  many hours we talked over skype, allmost nothing worked.
1. They were supposed to give me a dynamic email template the fist 10-15 days. Well... It tooks them 3 months.
2. Can not handle their own unsubscribe links. I have unsubscribed this over 3 times, and i am still getting emails. What to expect after that....
3. My initial project manager, left their company in my first 2 weeks, and NOBODY bothered to let me know or assign my account to someone else. So i was sending skype messages and emails for 10 days with no responce what so ever.
4. No emails were delivered to hotmail users. Now all the emails went out from their server. But when i told them, they instructed ME to send an enquiry to hotmail and see what is happening. How cool is that??? I did it though, and got a responce from hotmail. I forwarded it to them, and guess what they told me. Correct. To contact hotmail again for a problem THEY had. FYI i was sending transactional emails from my server and my own domain and newsletter from another newletter platform and hotmail users got their emails delievered just fine..
4. I have asked them to pause my subscription and reactivate it when they have all their matters sort in order. I am not willing to pay a platform in order for them to debug their issues. I have send emails in early June. And now they have contacted that canceling takes up to am month, blah, blah and requested payment, but hte were very generous and offered me a 50% discount.
5. The responce time is horrible. I would send messages in Skype, and i would get no responce. And when i did, it would answer only 1 of my questions from many more. Same with emails.

We were not willing to give any review, because we thought they have learned from our time together and the mistakes they have made. Obviously they have no idea how bad our experience was, and we want to help them get better. And now that we are looking for a new platform, we understand how important those are to others. The only one that was professional was Pawel Krajewski, and we thank him for that. But this company is a joke. We never want to hear them again, and we are setting them as the worst example to the companies we are searching to cooperate right now. (activecampaign-exponea-dotmailer)

Recommendations to others considering SALESmanago:
Look out there for a better platform. And no matter what they offer. Pick some platform that can deliver what it promises.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
None. Just lost 3 motnhs of our time.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
The huge thing about SalesManago is the amount of possible integrations, automation rules, different scenarios etc.. These guys support eCommerce, Facebook, SMS, beacons and a lot of other services. Price for this package is very nice and you pay for database, not amount of sent emails (which is nice). Client service is pretty good. BUT the best for me is that they're always trying to make new functionalities. They have big roadmap with very exciting ideas, and month by month they make (or try to make) them happen.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
Unfortunately, a lot of these cool features aren't working properly. Segmentation is slow, IP reputation is alerting, integration with Magento is very simple and needs a lot of work on your side.

For one example - Creating automation rules was very limited few months ago, but they made new creator which made things good. And they have a lot of these problems - cool functionality, but hard to implement. They also lack educational materials other than live webinars, so if you want to work on your Marketing Automation, you have to do it on your own.

And you have to pay extra fee for implementing dynamic e-mails & you have to wait for few months to get it done by their IT team. Doing it with smart DIY creator would be a lot more useful (even for extra fee).

Recommendations to others considering SALESmanago:

all_reviews.review_title: Quite good tool for marketing automation, yet with lots of bugs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
The most useful feature of SALESmanago is its automation - where you can configure reactions based on the actions of the users (like opening e-mail, visiting certain website page, getting certain score or filling out the form). It helps marketers to do more without loads of work. Since our company is from Poland and SALESmanago is from Poland their customer service is very good for us.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
SALESmanage has constant problems with bugs - especially with the mailing creator (WYSIWYG editor). It does not have source editor, provides small functionality and customization options. The service provider makes changes without tests or lack of tests, so you can run into a bug easily. If you consider use it to send your mailings often - it is not a good system - customer support is kind, but they lack of technical knowledge and when ask they pass problems to tech team which works slooooowly.

Recommendations to others considering SALESmanago:
You should try it - since there's a month for free. It has good features and in the future can be good tool, but keep in mind, that technical aspects are not well maintained.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
The app makes your marketing more automatic and human-independent. You can send e-mail automatically based on the actions of the clients in your system/website/application. You can focus on planning more, while daily work is done without your attention.

all_reviews.review_title: Useful information but not so user-friendly interface
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
The great thing about SalesManago is that we can finally track what our leads are doing ON our site. Once a visitor enters their email address, SalesManago starts tracking their behavior across the entire site. This can be super useful to understand customer behavior.

Plus, it's one of the most affordable marketing automation solutions out there.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
The overall interface isn't so intuitive. The email tool doesn't make sense to me yet. Instead of creating one template to use over and over, I have to create a new template for EACH email. Plus, there are a LOT of fields and dropdown menus.

The landing page tool doesn't create the most attractive pages. And somehow the drag-and-drop email creator doesn't work with the standard email tool.

The rules can also get complicated. For example, when I want to track a funnel, instead of simply listing what page contacts should visit in order to be added to a new portion of the funnel, I have to create a NEW automation rule (in a different part of the software), then go back and notify that when this rule is triggered, THEN add the contact to the new funnel portion. There are a lot of in between steps involved that I feel could be simplified.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Looking to track user behavior and create automated email campaigns.

all_reviews.review_content:

Since we have a B2B type of business, it is extremely important for us to capture as many leads as we can and to nurture them until they become customers and loyal customers. SALESmanago is the most complete tool I have ever found until now. Practically, it gives us an overview of the prospects in one place that allows us to send personalized offers, to the right person, at the right time.

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since it monitors 360o  the behavior of each site's contact, we use SALESmanago to personalize customer communication. It automatically segments contacts depending on what product or service from the site attracted the contact interest and also the repeated visits' time. Being a marketing automation tool, it significantly simplifies the working time and saves a lot of resources.

Simplicity of first implementation. The architecture of the system that differentiates information about users, (events) transactions and tags - each operational enought to build rules around them.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
That a lot of "simple" functions that should work out of the box has bugs or stops working suddenly - preventing a dispatch of emails (without alerting us that it didn't work) from going out, and eventually loss of money. System is buggy and for non-standard products needs a lot of very specialized work (both for client and salesmanago crew) to get some stuff up and running.

All newsletter communication - both general and marketing automation.

all_reviews.review_title: Customer Service is slow, Automation system does not work properly
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
There are lots of great features that we can utilize for CRM and email retargetting. Salesmanago pricing is also good compared with their competitors, so if your company is an SME and have a restrained budget then I'd recommend SalesManago.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
That being said, the system does not work properly. Automation rules only work 70-80%. Also, we have been struggling with integrating Salesmanago and other platforms like Facebook, Microsoft Dynamics and there have always been error/bugs. Worst thing is their Customer Service just didn't pay enough attention to help. We have to continuously pushing for response to our queries thru webchat, Skype chat, email etc., up to a point that we are tired and considering of switching to other platform like Hubspot or Marketo even though price is triple.

Marketing automation for an e-commerce website. Benefits: better understanding of our customer.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool and superb customer service!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SALESmanago?
The tool is complex. Fills our CRM needs, marketing automation and mailing solution. Great help with email alerts for monitored contacts and overall marketing automation that makes sales team work easier. Mailing tool is also nice&easy with A/B tests available. Also, what is personally important for me its Made in Poland (=quality and great customer support)! I love sending emails via proxy settings (via regular email client, but with stats visible and marketing automation doable depending on the read/clicked status.

What do you dislike about SALESmanago?
UX and the way certain rules work (or don't) needs to be fixed. Some issues at the customer service are taking a lot of time to be fixed. The tool is quite new, so some things don't work yet as they are expected, but most are quickly being fixed when reported. When sending a lot of emails, queues are causing delays in email deliverability and sometimes dynamically generated links stop working for some odd reason and there are no tools to automatically show it.

Recommendations to others considering SALESmanago:
make sure you delegate on person within a company that will work with a customer manager from SALESmanago. Not everyone within your organisation even needs to have their access to it (they can use email alerts). Also, weekly webinars are a great thing!

What problems is SALESmanago solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing automation - scoring and email alerts when a monitored customer views important pages (i.e. offer). We are using SALESmanago as our main CRM, so no other tools are required here, although the CRM is yet quite simple&limited.
